title: Futurecraft Leather - adidas
description:
For creators. By creators. This is Futurecraft Leather.

It is our approach. It is our direction. It is our journey.
Futurecraft Leather is a prototype and a statement of intent. By reimagining how to work with leather, a material that is synonymous with the adidas brand, we have created a “first of its kind” product in an entirely new way. Milling leather allows us to push the limits of our craft, bringing new form and function to a traditional material.

This new innovation meets a true adidas Originals icon, in the form of the Superstar. With just 45 pairs available worldwide, Futurecraft Leather is an homage to the Superstar’s years since its inception.
